text:
New Clothes

Raskolnikov's room, tense atmosphere  
Nastasya frowns, skeptical.  
Nastasya: “But perhaps they won’t fit.”  

Razumihin grins, holding a boot.  
Razumihin: “Just look! Size taken from this monster!”  
Razumihin: “You’re set up with a complete new rig-out!”  

---  

Raskolnikov, frustrated, waves him off.  
Raskolnikov: “Let me be! I don’t want to!”  

Razumihin, determined, pulls out linen.  
Razumihin: “Don’t tell me I’ve been trudging around for nothing!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin presents Raskolnikov with a new set of clothes and insists on helping him despite his reluctance.
